sentence: Wa kudak-en=en az rui půt δêd1 su-t2.
glosses_en: DEM.PL child-PL=3PL EL CAUS ball fight1,2-PST
back_translation_en: The children fought over the ball.

back_translation_ru: Дети подрались из-за мяча.

sentence: Yu čorik az rui čīd xu virod qati δêd1 su-t2.
glosses_en: DEM3.M.SG man(M) EL CAUS house REFL brother COM fight1,2-PST
back_translation_en: The man argued with his younger brother over the house.

back_translation_ru: Мужчина поссорился с братом из-за дома.

sentence: Yā ɣ̌inik=i az rui wi sūrat-en wam kitob zox̌-t.
glosses_en: DEM3.F.SG woman(F)=3SG EL CAUS 3SG.M.OBL appearance-3PL DEM.3F.SG.OBL book(F) buy-PST
back_translation_en: The woman bought the book because of the pictures.

sentence: Yā ɣ̌inik=i az rui xu bezeb nastroen xu ox̌no qati na-wīn-t.
glosses_en: DEM3.F.SG woman(F)=3SG EL CAUS REFL ugly mood REFL friend COM NEG-see-PST
back_translation_en: The woman did not meet her friend because of her bad mood.
